name: Energy in Buildings & Industry
description:
ENERGY IN BUILDINGS & INDUSTRY (EiBI) is the UKís only monthly magazine for energy management. Established for over 29 years, EiBI is the energy managerís prime source of up-to-date news, views and technical developments. The recently launched supplement ENERGY @ HOME is aimed at private and public housing, covering various product areas such as heating, lighting, solar, heat pumps, water conservation etc.is a must read for those who are involved in house building, housing associations, local authorities and architectural practices.

EiBI has helped thousands of public sector, commercial and industrial organisations save millions of pounds through the more efficient use of energy. With the recent announcement of the UKís long term energy policy and the implications that this will have on the industry, EiBI will continue to play a key role in introducing the suppliers of energy-saving products and services to the 11,000+ readers, who are required to closely manage their organisationsí energy use.

Members of the editorial and advertising teams will be on the stand throughout the show.
